verifyEmail.title: Verifying your email…
verifyEmail.description: Please wait while we confirm your verification link.

login.title: Logging you in…
login.description: We are preparing your session. This may take a moment.

createUser.title: Loading your account…
createUser.description: We are setting up your profile and preferences.

accessDenied.title: Oops, something is missing!
accessDenied.description: Access to this page is restricted.You do not have the required permissions.

logout.title: Successfully logged out
logout.description: You have been logged out of your account.

errorTexts.title: Logout failed
errorTexts.description: An error occurred while logging out. Please try again.
